## Exploring the Gapminder Object

```{r}
library("gapminder")
library("tidyverse")

# Type/ class of the object
typeof(gapminder)
class(gapminder)

# Size of the object
nrow(gapminder)

ncol(gapminder)
# or
length(gapminder)

# Data type of each variable
str(gapminder)

```



## Exploring some Variables

```{r}

select(gapminder, year) %>%
  range()

select(gapminder, lifeExp) %>%
  range()

# Select all the unique values for "country"
select(gapminder, country) %>%
  distinct() -> countries

# Display the vector of countries and how many there are
countries
nrow(countries)

#Find out how many rows of data there are for a single country
filter(gapminder, country %in% c("Algeria")) %>%
  nrow()

```
